content.raw:
We can probably remove several `gazebo/math` includes:

~~~
louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC$ grep -r "gazebo/math" gazebo/sensors/
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Rand.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Rand.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/Sensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDTag.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDSensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/GpuRaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
gazebo/sensors/GpuRaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor_TEST.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
~~~
content.html:
We can probably remove several gazebo/math includes:

louisep@hadaly:~/gazebo_source/gazeboC$ grep -r "gazebo/math" gazebo/sensors/
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Rand.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Rand.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/Sensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDSensor.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDTag.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RFIDSensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/GpuRaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
gazebo/sensors/GpuRaySensor.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/sensors/RaySensor_TEST.cc:#include "gazebo/math/Angle.hh"
